name: Clinging Ice
trait: Cantrip, Cold, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Freezing sleet and heavy snowfall collect on the target's feet and legs, dealing 1d4 cold damage and other effects depending on its Reflex save.

name: Discern Secrets
summary: Your patron deigns to whisper a few secrets.

name: Distortion Lens
summary: You create a magical lens that distorts space as best suits you.

name: Figment
summary: Create a simple auditory or visual illusion.

name: Glamorize
summary: Using simple magical gestures, you alter a minor detail of your appearance.

name: Information Overload
trait: Cantrip, Concentrate, Hex, Mental, Rare, Witch
summary: You call on Cobyslarni to open the target’s mind to knowledge—too much knowledge

name: Light
summary: Make an object glow.

name: Murmuration
trait: Cantrip, Concentrate, Hex, Sonic, Uncommon, Witch
summary: The target feels the brush of feathers against its skin and hears screeches in its ears, warning it to keep away from a creature you designate.

name: Pact Broker
trait: Auditory, Cantrip, Concentrate, Hex, Linguistic, Mental, Uncommon, Witch
summary: You offer to broker a pact of peace.

name: Prestidigitation
summary: Perform a minor magical trick.

name: Scrounger's Glee
trait: Auditory, Cantrip, Concentrate, Fear, Hex, Mental, Uncommon, Witch
summary: With a cruel laugh and a flash of your canines, you make a target understand that death is coming to claim it and that its demise will serve to strengthen another.

name: Shroud of Night
trait: Cantrip, Darkness, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron blankets the target's eyes in darkness.

name: Spirit Object
summary: Using a sliver of Baba Yaga’s power, you briefly bring a nearby object to life.

name: Sting of the Sea
summary: A long tentacle like that belonging to an octopus, anemone, or man-of-war, dripping with briny water, appears from a glowing blue portal to wrap around the target’s face, blocking its vision.

name: Stoke the Heart
trait: Cantrip, Concentrate, Emotion, Hex, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron fills a creature with fervor, empowering their blows.

name: Telekinetic Hand
summary: Move an object with a floating hand.
target: 1 unattended object of Light bulk or less

name: Trade Death for Life
trait: Cantrip, Healing, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron steals life from one of your enemies to grant it to another.

name: Wilding Word
summary: Your patron's majesty—or their displeasure—comes in a growl from your throat, making other creatures reluctant to harm you.

name: Astral Rain
summary: You fling a mass of furious thoughts into the air, where they expand into numerous blades or other shapes that rain down.

name: Ghostly Shift
summary: Your body becomes insubstantial as you partially phase out.

name: Song of Marching
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move.

name: Dancing Blade
summary: You telekinetically animate a weapon that's unattended or on your person.

name: Foresee the Path
summary: You see just a split second into the future and glean how an enemy will move, making it easier for your allies to strike it mid-action.

name: Tesseract Tunnel
summary: You race from point to point, tearing open a tunnel in space.

name: Appearance of Wealth
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You create a brief vision of immense wealth filling the spell's area.

name: Ashen Wind
summary: You conjure a swirling wind of ashes that blows through the area.

name: Blood Ward
summary: Your patron's aegis descends to shield a target from harm.

name: Cackle
summary: With a quick burst of laughter, you prolong a magical effect you created.

name: Darkened Forest Form
summary: Your apparition casts a feral shadow over your form.

name: Devouring Dark Form
summary: Your apparition's dark power blends with your physical body, allowing you to take on terrifying characteristics of creatures that lurk in dark places.

name: Discomfiting Whisper
trait: Animist, Aura, Focus, Misfortune, Uncommon, Void
summary: You are surrounded by an aura of spiteful murmurings that incite bad luck and punish failure.

name: Draconic Barrage
summary: You shape energy into a small group of tiny dragons (or other serpentine creatures) that flit around you.

name: Earth's Bile
summary: Your apparition is the will of lava and magma made manifest, the earth's molten blood unleashing devastating bursts of liquid stone and unquenchable fire at your command.

name: Elemental Betrayal
summary: Your patron uses its superior command of the elements, empowering them to undermine your foe.

name: Embodiment of Battle
summary: Your apparition guides your attacks and imparts its skill to your movements.

name: Friendly Push
summary: You exert magical force to propel a willing creature up to 10 feet in a straight line, including upward, though if they aren’t on solid ground or have another way to maintain their height (such as a fly Speed) when the movement ends, they fall.

name: Garden of Healing
trait: Animist, Aura, Emotion, Focus, Healing, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Spirits of comfort and respite swirl around you, trailing visions of growing grass and blooming blossoms.

name: Grasping Vine
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Plant, Uncommon, Wizard, Wood
summary: A thick, curling vine erupts from the ground beneath you and stretches to the target, allowing you to move it around.
target: 1 unattended object of up to 8 Bulk, or Medium or smaller creature that is currently on the ground

name: Halcyon Mists
summary: In a moment of dire need, you call upon ancestral power to strengthen and sustain.

name: Hymn of Healing
trait: Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: Your glorious singing mends wounds and provides a temporary respite from harm.

name: Magic's Vessel
summary: A creature becomes a divine receptacle for pure magical energy.

name: Manifest Will
trait: Aura, Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Rare, Subtle, Witch
summary: You unleash energy from the broken connection to your patron.

name: Nymph's Grace
trait: Animist, Aura, Emotion, Focus, Incapacitation, Mental, Uncommon, Visual
summary: Your apparition manifests as a mask of unearthly beauty that bewilders your enemies.

name: Protective Wards
summary: You expand a ring of glyphs that shields your allies.

name: River Carving Mountains
summary: Your apparition solidifies around you into roaring water and spraying mist.

name: Store Time
summary: You store time for later use.

name: String of Fate
summary: You bond yourself to a cherished friend, vowing to share their fate for good or for ill.

name: Stumbling Curse
trait: Curse, Focus, Hex, Transmutation, Uncommon, Witch
summary: With a twist of a finger, you send a creature careening on a haphazard trajectory.

name: Swarmsense
summary: You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures.

name: Swear Oath
summary: You loudly and firmly state a course of action that you swear to fulfill.
duration: until the end of your next turn

name: Traveling Workshop
summary: Your apparition guides you through complex procedures while using your magic to provide you with whatever tools you need.
duration: sustained up to 1 minute, or 8 hours

name: Trickster's Mirrors
trait: Animist, Focus, Illusion, Mental, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You are surrounded by up to 3 mirrors that reflect twisted and distorted images of you, making it hard to tell where you actually are within your space and potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the mirrors instead.

name: Unexpected Windfall
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Wizard
summary: Coins, trinkets carved from heavy stone, and other cumbersome treasures rain down upon a foe.

name: Veil of Dreams
trait: Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron draws the target into a drowsy state, causing daydreams and sluggishness.

name: Weapon Trance
summary: The serenity of violence fills your mind, giving you a heightened sense of knowing exactly where your weapons need to be.

name: Wildfire
source: Rage of Elements pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup>
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Fire, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: A thin layer of ash and flame covers the ground in the area.

name: Word of Truth
summary: You speak a statement that you believe to be true and that is free of any attempt to deceive through twisting words, omission, and so on.

name: Zenith Star
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Light, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You call a tiny star to orbit a creature in a sparkling halo before shooting up into the heavens, where it marks the creature’s rough location.

name: Beastmaster Trance
trait: Archetype, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You enter a trance that allows you to see through the senses of the target companion.
target: one animal companion you can perceive

name: Blood in the Water
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Spirit, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Predators are drawn to the scent of blood, and blood can disperse shockingly far in the water.

name: Eyes of the Dead
summary: You enter a magical trance that allows you to perceive through the senses of the target creature.
target: one undead creature under your control

name: Hedge Prison
source: Pathfinder #202: Severed at the Root pg. 72
summary: You conjure an intricate hedge prison to trap a creature, encasing them completely in a hollow cube of dense bushes.

name: Interstellar Void
trait: Cold, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemy.

name: Malicious Shadow
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Shadow, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron warps the target's shadow into a deadly form, such as strangling hands, a dangerous weapon, harrying runes, or the like.

name: Mycological Malady
trait: Concentrate, Disease, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: You infect your target with fungal spores to hasten the cycle of decay.

name: Personal Blizzard
summary: Your patron's breath becomes a blizzard of obscuring, scouring ice that follows your target.

name: Shroud of Flame
source: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 74
summary: You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames.

name: Steal Shadow
summary: You steal a creature's shadow, leaving it weakened and vulnerable.

name: Unravel Knowledge
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron reaches into the target’s mind, plucking out their past training like pulling a thread from a cloth.

name: Competitive Edge
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Your competitiveness drives you to prove yourself against the opposition.

name: Confront Selves
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You show the target the spiraling web of actions and consequences that is their life and the changes wrought by these decisions upon themselves and those around them.

name: Conjured Clockwork
source: Pathfinder #215: To Blot Out the Sun pg. 81
summary: You conjure a complex clockwork device on the ground and cause it to slowly spread across the battlefield.

name: Diamond Dust
trait: Aura, Cleric, Cold, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You supercool the nearby air, forming a cloud of dancing ice crystals in an emanation around you.

name: Dread Aura
trait: Aura, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Focus, Mental, Uncommon, Wizard
summary: You emit an aura of terror.

name: Ectoplasmic Interstice
summary: You force the mortal Universe and Ethereal Planes to partially merge, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures.

name: Fallow Field
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Void
summary: A sickly yellow light fills the area as entropic forces prevent healing.

name: Overflowing Sorrow
trait: Aura, Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Sadness flows out of you into nearby creatures, blotting out any other thoughts they had.

name: Protector's Sphere
trait: Aura, Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: A protective aura emanates out from you, safeguarding you and your allies.

name: Shielding Formation
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Force, Manipulate, Uncommon, Wizard
summary: You conjure magical shields of force to protect your allies around you.

name: Songbird's Call
trait: Aura, Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Focus, Uncommon
summary: Your voice calls a storm of songbirds that whirl around you and peck at your enemies.

name: Spiral of Horrors
trait: Aura, Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Wizard
summary: Shades and spirits howl and whirl around you in a display that strikes fear into the hearts of all who witness it.

name: Tireless Worker
source: Divine Mysteries pg. 271, Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 65
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that’s affecting the target: clumsy, encumbered, enfeebled, or fatigued.

name: Waking Dream
summary: You cloud the target's mind with vivid, dreamlike imagery, so they have difficulty distinguishing real threats from imagined ones.

name: Wood Walk
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Wood
summary: Wood shapes itself according to your will readily, making staircases appear as you climb up the side of a tree, automatically weaving vines into ladders, or lowering branches to lift you up to the top.

name: Consuming Darkness
summary: Your shadow wriggles before spreading out from you, forming a gateway of clinging, consuming shadow through which the horrors of another plane can barely be seen.

name: Curse of Death
trait: Concentrate, Curse, Death, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Void, Witch
summary: Your patron wraps a hand around your target's heart.

name: Gluttonous Growth
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Plant, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: Plants in the area grow rapidly, taking on carnivorous characteristics as they seek to consume prey.
area: all squares that contain plants in a 20-foot burst

name: Spellmaster's Ward
summary: You create one or more glowing protective runes that revolve around you.

name: Ancestral Form
summary: You take the form of your ancestral spirits, becoming invisible and quasi-corporeal.

name: For Love, For Lightning
summary: When you Cast the Spell, you plunge the required weapon into the ground, where it crackles with crimson lightning.

name: Shadow Illusion
trait: Auditory, Focus, Illusion, Shadow, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You create a shadowy illusion of a creature or a stationary object, but the illusion can exist only in an area of dim light or darkness.

name: Tempest Form
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Polymorph, Uncommon
summary: Your body becomes fluid.

name: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
summary: You create a protective circle around yourself that repels your foes.

name: Impaling Briars
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Plant, Uncommon, Wood
summary: The ground within the area transforms into a mass of dangerous briars that assault and impede your foes.

name: Qi Form
summary: Drawing from deep wells of spiritual power, you take on a special qi form.

name: Storm Lord
trait: Air, Concentrate, Druid, Electricity, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: The sky above you darkens in a matter of moments, swirling with ominous clouds punctuated by flashes of lighting.

name: Unbreaking Wave Containment
summary: You wrap enemies in four strands of water.

name: Pied Piping
trait: Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Focus, Incapacitation, Mental, Sonic, Uncommon
summary: Your performance enraptures listeners, compelling them to follow you.

name: Song of the Fallen
summary: Rouse the dead or smite the undead.
target: up to 4 dead creatures or up to 4 undead creatures

name: Animate Rope
summary: Command a rope to move and tie as you wish.
target: up to 50 feet of rope or a nonliving rope-like object

name: Bane
summary: Weaken enemies' attacks in an aura around you.

name: Benediction
summary: Divine protection helps protect your companions.

name: Carryall
summary: A floating platform follows you, carrying objects.

name: Cycle of Retribution
source: Pathfinder #197: Let the Leaves Fall pg. 71
summary: An understanding of how violence begets more violence fills your target, causing it mental anguish

name: Defended By Spirits
summary: You entreat a spirit or the spiritual energies in your location to surround and protect an ally from an certain foe.

name: Inkshot
summary: A spray of viscous, toxic ink jets from your fingertip to strike a target creature in the face.

name: Leaden Steps
summary: Make creatures heavy and weak to electricity.

name: Malediction
summary: You incite distress in the minds of your enemies, making it more difficult for them to defend themselves.

name: Pet Cache
summary: Hide a familiar or animal companion in a pocket dimension.
target: 1 willing creature that is your companion

name: Phantasmal Minion
summary: Create a creature of force to perform minor tasks.

name: Scouring Sand
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 78
summary: You blast the area with grit that scours away soil and gets into creatures’ eyes.

name: Spirit Ward
summary: You draw on nearby spiritual energy or on echoes of the spirits you’ve invoked throughout your life to temporarily ward living flesh against dangerous spirits.

name: Summon Animal
summary: Conjure an animal to fight for you.

name: Summon Construct
summary: Conjure a construct to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Fey
summary: Conjure a fey to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Lesser Servitor
summary: Summon a minor celestial, monitor, or fiend.

name: Summon Plant or Fungus
summary: Conjure a plant or fungus to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Undead
summary: Conjure an undead to fight on your behalf.

name: Synchronize Steps
summary: You link the minds of two targets, enabling them to move in tandem.

name: Animated Assault
summary: Temporarily animate small objects to attack.

name: Animus Mine
summary: You implant a mental mine within your psyche that detonates against anyone attempting to magically manipulate your thoughts.

name: Avenging Wildwood
summary: Medium tree sprouts in an unoccupied square within range, its branches capable of striking out at your foes.

name: Bee-Man's Summons
summary: You recreate the Bee-Man’s infamous ability to sense when someone utters their name.
duration: until the next time you make your <%RULES%2575%%>daily preparations or until discharged

name: Breath of Drought
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 78
summary: You fill the area with an oppressive, arid swelter that overwhelms creatures with heat exhaustion.

name: Burrow Ward
summary: Prevent burrowing in earth near you.

name: Buzzing Servants
summary: You summon a swarm of bees from the city of Axis that rapidly constructs geometric shapes from wax.

name: Calm
summary: Suppress strong emotions and hostility.

name: Carrion Mire
summary: The ground opens into a seemingly endless mass of corpse limbs.

name: Clawsong
summary: You sing a fierce prayer, low and growling, and awaken the ancient spirit of a Terwa beast to guide and strengthen the target's unarmed blows.
target: 1 willing creature with an unarmed claw Strike

name: Coiling Dance
summary: You perform a dance that seeks to pass on the knowledge and wisdom of a naga.

name: Dancing Shield
source: Battlecry! pg. 85, Knights of Lastwall pg. 92
target: 1 touched shield (unattended or in your possession) and 1 willing creature

name: Floating Flame
summary: Summoned fire moves at your command.

name: Helpful Wood Spirits
summary: Make a gaggle of wood spirits carry out a small task.

name: Illusory Creature
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Illusion, Manipulate, Olfactory, Visual
summary: Form a convincing illusion of a creature.

name: Laughing Fit
summary: Laughter impedes a creature's actions.

name: Mind Games
summary: You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them.

name: Osseous Cage
summary: You conjure a prison made of bone.

name: Pack Attack
summary: You and one other target gain an uncanny coordination that helps you take down foes.

name: Pave Ground
summary: Even out the ground in a line.

name: Persistent Servant
summary: Summon a long-term unseen servant for a single task.

name: Phantom Crowd
summary: Create an illusory crowd that loudly agrees with you.

name: Quench
summary: Put out fires and hurt fire creatures.

name: Reaper’s Lantern
summary: A ghostly lantern diminishes healing for the living and weakens the undead.

name: Sonata Span
summary: Manifest a path with a tune.

name: Spiritual Armament
summary: Project a weapon imbued with spiritual power.

name: Summon Elemental
summary: Conjure an elemental to fight on your behalf.

name: Timely Tutor
summary: Connect your eidolon or familiar to the Akashic Record to briefly grant it knowledge.

name: Vicious Jealousy
summary: The target is overcome by deep jealousy and resentment that twists its mind against other creatures.

name: Animal Vision
summary: Project your senses through an animal.

name: Aqueous Orb
summary: Roll a ball of water to put out fires and engulf creatures.

name: Burglar's Blind
summary: The only thing thieves love more than being silent and stealthy is the piles of gold they win with that silence and stealth.

name: Cozy Cabin
summary: Conjure a temporary cabin sheltered from the elements.

name: Cyclone Rondo
summary: Playing or singing melodies discovered by the ancient Shory, you call up a whirlwind

name: Enthrall
summary: Your speech makes creatures fascinated with you.

name: Familiar’s Face
summary: Implant your senses and voice in your companion.
target: 1 willing creature that’s your animal companion or familiar

name: Focusing Hum
summary: A pleasant hum helps resist distractions

name: Gasping Marsh
summary: With a rattling hiss, you create a quickly evaporating mist of invisible poisonous marsh gas to smother creatures in the area.

name: Hypnotize
summary: Shifting colors dazzle and fascinate creatures.

name: Infectious Ennui
summary: With a wave of your hand and a short invocation, you cause feelings of ennui and impending doom to well up in the mind of the targeted creature, who must attempt a Will save.

name: Lashing Rope
source: Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 81
summary: You cause a section of rope or a rope-like object to animate, slither to your square, and encircle you, wreathing you in twisting, lashing fibers.
target: up to 50 feet of unattended rope or an inanimate rope-like object

name: Levitate
summary: Float an object or creature a few feet off the ground.

name: Locate
summary: Learn the direction to an object.
target: 1 specific object or type of object

name: Mad Monkeys
summary: Summon magical monkey spirits to make mischief.

name: Mind Reading
summary: Read a creature's surface thoughts.
duration: 1 round or sustained up to 1 minute

name: Overwhelming Memory
summary: You cause the target to recall a specific type of memory.

name: Painted Scout
summary: You press your hand to the stone, causing hand-drawn scouts to spread out from your fingers.
target: a cave wall or other stone surface

name: Positive Attunement
summary: Attune a creature to the Positive Energy Plane, healing a living creature or damaging an undead.

name: Pyrotechnics
source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 77
summary: You turn a fire into either a burst of blinding fireworks or a thick cloud of choking smoke

name: Radiant Globe
summary: You create a dome of brilliant light that destroys projectiles attempting to pass through it.

name: Roaring Applause
summary: Force the target to cheer and applaud you.

name: Safe Passage
summary: Make an area safe to move through.

name: Scrying Ripples
summary: Scry from one body of water into another.

name: Shifting Sand
summary: You cause the surface to heave.
area: a horizontal earthen or sandy surface within a 20-foot <%RULES%2385%%>burst

name: Sign of Conviction
summary: You conjure the religious symbol of your deity into the air above you in the same space you stand in, wielding the power of your faith to smite your foes.

name: Threefold Aspect
summary: Shift yourself between three ages.
duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations

name: Cinder Swarm
summary: Create insects made of fire.

name: Cloak of Light
summary: You surround yourself in holy light that restores the living and rebuffs undead.

name: Dawnflower's Light
summary: The object glows with soft golden light that lays bare the truth, reveals hidden objects, and shines supernatural light on false orders.
target: 1 unattended, non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less

name: Detect Creator
summary: You examine the remains or spiritual residue of a destroyed undead creature to locate that undead's creator, perhaps a necromancer or vampire.

name: Dirge of Remembrance
summary: You sing a funereal dirge to force restless spirits to fully manifest in the Material Plane.

name: Fallen Soldier's Lament
trait: Concentrate, Illusion, Manipulate, Mental, Rare, Visual
summary: You raise an illusion in the space of a fallen foe, crafting it to resemble a ghost of your target before parading it across the battlefield.
target: 1 corpse of a Medium or smaller creature that has died within the past 8 hours

name: Flicker
summary: Protect yourself from most damage as you teleport erratically.

name: Girzanje's March
summary: You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song.

name: Grasping Earth
summary: Create hands of rock from the ground to grab creatures.

name: Ice Storm
summary: Call a storm cloud that pelts creatures with hail.

name: Invisibility Curtain
summary: Wall makes creatures on one side invisible to the other side.

name: Life's Fresh Bloom
source: Pathfinder #197: Let the Leaves Fall pg. 75
summary: The ground around you blooms with life, sprouting sparkling grass, flowers, and small shrubs

name: Luring Wail
summary: You emit a plaintive cry to lure your enemies closer.

name: Misty Memory
summary: Replay a scene from the past through the medium of water.
target: 1 body of water of at least 5 square feet

name: Morass of Ages
summary: Temporal eddies make each step feel like an eternity

name: Movanic Glimmer
summary: You give the target animal a glimmer of awareness, not truly awakening it but allowing it to better understand its surroundings.
duration: until you next perform your daily preparations

name: Pernicious Poltergeist
summary: Call forth a poltergeist to make mischief.

name: Phantasmal Protagonist
summary: You create a phantasmal incarnation of a significant character from a novel, historical work, or religious parable.

name: Radiant Heart of Devotion
summary: You speak a fervent prayer for the heavens to assist you and your righteous allies.

name: Reflected Beauty
source: Pathfinder #205: Singer, Stalker, Skinsaw Man pg. 81
summary: When you cast _reflected beauty_, choose a willing creature that’s the same size as you and that you can see within 30 feet.

name: Replicate
summary: Create an illusory duplicate of a creature.
target: 1 willing or unconscious creature of 8th level or lower

name: Rewrite Memory
summary: Alter, erase, or implant memories.

name: Sacred Nimbus
source: Pathfinder #197: Let the Leaves Fall pg. 76
summary: You summon a small, fluffy white nimbus cloud

name: Sanguine Mist
summary: Create a cloud of life-draining fog that siphons vitality into you.

name: Sliding Blocks
summary: Make cubes of stone and repeatedly move them around.

name: Stonesense
source: Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 79
summary: You can tremorsense

name: Tomorrow's Dawn
source: Pathfinder #197: Let the Leaves Fall pg. 76
summary: The golden light of a new dawn and the promise of life beyond death radiates from your body.

name: Web of Influence
summary: You learn the location of the nearest creature to whom the target is connected in a magical manner.

name: Ancestral Winds
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Void
summary: You call on the same energies that manifest ancestor storms, summoning wailing spirits to terrorize your foes.

name: Domora's Defense
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Linguistic, Manipulate, Uncommon, Water
summary: When you Cast this Spell, a watery replica of the eidolon Dyzad appears in front of each of the targets.

name: Drop Dead
summary: The target appears to die, but turns invisible.
trigger: A creature within range is hit by an attack from an enemy.

name: False Vision
summary: Trick a scrying spell.

name: Forceful Hand
summary: Create a hand of force that can interpose to defend you or attack if heightened.

name: Freezing Rain
summary: Chill and slow creatures with cold rain.

name: Glimmer of Charm
summary: Briefly improve the attitude of nearby creatures with a charming aura.

name: Infectious Comedy
source: Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes pg. 79
summary: You tell a magical joke and infect a target with laughter that spreads to those nearby.

name: Invoke Spirits
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Manipulate, Mental, Void
summary: Call a group of ghostly apparitions to attack your foes.

name: Lightning Storm
summary: Create clouds and call down lightning.

name: Mind Probe
summary: Uncover knowledge and memories in a creature's mind.

name: Mirror Malefactors
summary: Mirrors surround a target, and the reflections attack them repeatedly.

name: Pillars of Sand
source: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands pg. 74
summary: Create pillars of sand.

name: Scouring Pulse
summary: You inundate the area with concentrated positive energy, which scours away the stain of undeath.

name: Scouting Eye
summary: Invisible eye transmits what it sees to you.

name: Spiritual Guardian
summary: Create a magical guardian to attack at your command and take damage for your allies.

name: Summon Anarch
summary: Summon a chaotic celestial, monitor, or fiend.

name: Summon Axiom
summary: Summon a lawful celestial, monitor, or fiend.

name: Summon Celestial
summary: Conjure a celestial to fight for you.

name: Summon Dragon
summary: Conjure a dragon to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Entity
summary: Conjure an aberration to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Fiend
summary: Conjure a fiend to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Giant
summary: Conjure a giant to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Monitor
summary: Conjure a planar monitor to fight on your behalf.

name: Telekinetic Haul
summary: Move a large object.
target: 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet

name: Aura of the Unremarkable
source: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 77
summary: You and allies in the area appear to be completely innocuous to other creatures within the spell's area, regardless of the actions you're committing.

name: Awaken Entropy
summary: Age creatures and objects to dust

name: Bound in Death
summary: You tether another creature's spirit to your own, shunting part of the damage dealt to you onto one of your foes.

name: Elemental Confluence
summary: Summon a confluence of elementals of all four elements.

name: Field of Life
summary: Create a vital energy field that heals those who remain within.

name: Flame Vortex
summary: Invoke a moving tornado of fire and wind.

name: Frost Pillar
summary: Freeze a creature in a pillar of ice.

name: Frozen Fog
summary: You conjure a chilling mist that settles into the bones and makes it difficult to move.

name: Gray Shadow
summary: You pray over a dying creature, drawing its shadow into your service as long as its owner is stooped at death's door.

name: Lure Dream
summary: You reach out to the dream realm, beckoning an animate dream to your side.

name: Mislead
summary: Turn invisible and create a duplicate of yourself who acts like you.

name: Missed Cue
source: Pathfinder #205: Singer, Stalker, Skinsaw Man pg. 83
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Manipulate, Mental, Rare
summary: You make the spell’s target believe they had something incredibly important to say but forgot to say it, and now they’ve missed their opportunity.

name: Phantom Orchestra
summary: An invisible orchestra damages with bursts of sound.

name: Poltergeist's Fury
summary: Become the center of a storm of telekinetic fury

name: Rose's Thorns
summary: Rose bushes with razor-sharp thorns sprout from the ground in the area.

name: Scrying
summary: Spy on a creature you choose.

name: Suffocate
summary: You forcefully and cruelly draw the living breath from a creature's lungs, dealing 4d8 bludgeoning damage.
target: 1 living creature that needs to breathe

name: Tangling Creepers
summary: Entangle creatures in a burst and concentrate to lash out with immobilizing vines.

name: Vibrant Pattern
summary: Make a pattern of lights that dazzles and blinds creatures who enter the area.

name: Zero Gravity
summary: Remove gravity in an area.

name: Control Sand
source: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands pg. 73
summary: Manipulate sand around you.

name: Dancing Fountain
summary: Tap a splendid fountain with majestic displays you command.

name: Devouring Void
summary: Countless tears in space appear in the area, like hungry mouths.

name: Duplicate Foe
summary: Create a temporary duplicate of an enemy to fight for you.

name: Entrancing Eyes
source: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 74
summary: Your eyes glow with an entrancing radiance that captivates those who meet your gaze.

name: Ethereal Jaunt
summary: Use the Ethereal Plane to move through objects and into the air.

name: Hungry Depths
summary: Open a door to corrupted water that damages and consumes.

name: Lifewood Cage
summary: Trap a creature in a wooden cage.

name: Maze of Locked Doors
summary: The target of your spell is drawn into a long, twisting, extradimensional hallway.

name: Project Image
summary: Make an illusion of yourself you can cast spells through.

name: Retrocognition
summary: Sense impressions of past events at your location.

name: Vacuum
summary: Inhale to steal breath from creatures around you.

name: Vibrant Vibrato
source: Pathfinder #205: Singer, Stalker, Skinsaw Man pg. 83
trait: Auditory, Aura, Concentrate, Manipulate, Rare, Sonic
summary: Your voice trills in perfect vibrato.

name: Antimagic Field
summary: Magic doesn't function in an area around you.

name: Clone Companion
summary: Create a duplicate animal companion that mirrors your companion's actions.

name: Confusing Colors
summary: Dazzle, confuse, or stun creatures in a cloud.

name: Divine Aura
summary: Allies in an aura have better defenses and are protected against one alignment.

name: Migration
summary: Turn creatures into swift-moving animals.
target: you and up to 5 willing creatures

name: Mimic Spell
summary: You learn the secrets of a spell just by watching someone else cast it.
trigger: A creature you’re aware of within range Casts a Spell of the same tradition as _mimic spell_ and of the same or lower rank.

name: Monstrosity Form
summary: Turn into a powerful monster.

name: Musical Shift
source: Pathfinder #205: Singer, Stalker, Skinsaw Man pg. 83
summary: With a quick series of wrist flicks, music fills the air.

name: Punishing Winds
summary: A cyclone inhibits flight and traps creatures.

name: Quandary
summary: Trap a creature in an extradimensional puzzle.

name: Take Your Places
source: Pathfinder #205: Singer, Stalker, Skinsaw Man pg. 83
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Linguistic, Manipulate, Rare, Teleportation
summary: The scene would play out exactly as you envisioned it, if only the actors would respect their blocking.

name: Whirlpool
summary: Create a vortex of waves.

name: Whirlwind
summary: Create a moving tornado to damage creatures and raise them into the air.

name: Divinity Leech
source: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege pg. 75
summary: You disrupt the connection between a divine caster or deific servitor and their deity, blocking their use of divine power.

name: Implosion
summary: Make a creature collapse in on itself.

name: Magnetic Dominion
summary: Reposition metal creatures and creatures in metal armor.
target: any number of creatures wearing metal armor, creatures made of metal, creatures that have the metal trait, and unattended metal objects

name: Metamorphosis
summary: Fluidly change between different forms.

name: Unfathomable Song
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Mental
summary: Song debilitates creatures in weird and powerful ways.

name: Voracious Gestalt
summary: Create a spirit gestalt that eats souls and grows stronger.

name: Wrathful Storm
summary: Create and control a massive storm.

name: Avatar
summary: Transform into a battle form with benefits determined by your deity.

name: Gate
summary: Tear open a portal to another plane.

name: Revival
summary: Heal creatures in an area and return the dead to life temporarily.
target: dead creatures and living creatures of your choice within range
